sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"复制品"之意。
means: copy ： 普通用词，含义广泛，指精确的或不精确的复制品。
duplicate ： 常指完全一模一样，可代替原件的复制品。
model ： 可指按某物式样制造、按比例缩小的模型，也可指某物未制成之前做出的模型。
reproduction ： 批按原物复制的产品，着重复制品与原物相似。
facsimile ： 含义与copy大体相同，但较文雅。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"复印，复制"之意。
means: xerox ： 指用静电复印或用静电印刷术复制。
copy ： 着重模仿者的有意识行为或模仿得尽可能接近原件。
duplicate ： 指对原件进行复制或复印，侧重结果与原件一模一样。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a transcript or copy of a document): from Old French copie (noun), copier (verb), from Latin copia 'abundance' (in medieval Latin 'transcript', from such phrases as copiam describendi facere 'give permission to transcribe')

encyclopedia.content: 简介 DOS下最常用的拷贝命令 用法 COPY [/D] [/V] [/N] [/Y | /-Y] [/Z] [/A | /B ] source [/A | /B] [+ source [/A | /B] [+ ...]] [destination [/A | /B]] source 指定要复制的文件。 /A 表示一个 ASCII 文本文件。 /B 表示一个二进位文件。 /D 允许解密要创建的目标文件 destination 为新文件指定目录和/或文件名。 /V 验证新文件写入是否正确。 /N 复制带有非 8dot3 名称的文件时， 尽可能使用短文件名。 /Y 不使用确认是否

entry.def: If you make a copy of something, you produce something that looks like the original thing.

example.ex: The reporter apparently obtained a copy of Steve's resignation letter...
example.tran: 那记者显然弄到了史蒂夫辞职信的复印件。

example.ex: Always keep a copy of everything in your own files.
example.tran: 要时刻牢记把所有文件都备份。

entry.def: If you copy something, you produce something that looks like the original thing.

example.ex: She never participated in obtaining or copying any classified documents for anyone.
example.tran: 她从未参与过为任何人获取或复制机密文件之事。

example.ex: ...lawsuits against companies who have unlawfully copied computer programs.
example.tran: 对非法复制计算机程序的公司提起的诉讼

entry.def: If you copy a piece of writing, you write it again exactly.

example.ex: He would allow John slyly to copy his answers to impossibly difficult algebra questions...
example.tran: 他会让约翰偷偷抄下自己对一些极难的代数题的解答。

example.ex: He copied the data into a notebook...
example.tran: 他将数据抄在一个笔记本上。

entry.def: If you copy a person or what they do, you try to do what they do or try to be like them, usually because you admire them or what they have done.

example.ex: Children can be seen to copy the behaviour of others whom they admire or identify with...
example.tran: 人们发现儿童会模仿他们所崇拜或有共鸣感的人。

example.ex: He can claim to have been defeated by opponents copying his own tactics.
example.tran: 他可以说是被仿效自己策略的对手们给打败了。

entry.def: A copy of a book, newspaper, or CD is one of many that are exactly the same.

example.ex: I bought a copy of 'USA Today' from a street-corner machine...
example.tran: 我从街角的自动售卖机买了一份《今日美国》。

example.ex: You can obtain a copy for $2 from New York Central Art Supply.
example.tran: 花两美元就能从纽约艺术用品中心买到一册。

entry.tran: (准备刊印或广播的)原稿，稿件
entry.def: In journalism, copy is written material that is ready to be printed or read in a broadcast.

example.ex: ...his ability to write the most lyrical copy in the history of sports television.
example.tran: 他能够撰写体育节目史上最富热情和激情的稿件

entry.tran: 有报道价值的消息;新闻素材
entry.def: In journalism, copy is news or information that can be used in an article in a newspaper.

means.word_mean: 1. a reproduction of a written record (e.g. of a legal or school record)
2. a secondary representation of an original;

sentences.sentence: "she made a copy of the designer dress"

means.word_mean: 3. matter to be printed; exclusive of graphical materials
4. material suitable for a journalistic account;

sentences.sentence: "The students were made to copy the alphabet over and over"
"Children often copy their parents or older siblings"

means.word_mean: 3. biology: reproduce or make an exact copy of;

list.explanation: 产品的一件、一部、一个、一台等

example.en: We sell the toy at $14 a copy.
example.zh: 这玩具我们卖 14 美元一个。

auth_sentence.content: It's always good to have a physical copy.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's always good to have a physical copy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's always good to have a physical copy.

auth_sentence.content: Fans of Melbourne's Cut Copy will be appreciative.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fans of Melbourne's Cut Copy will be appreciative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fans of Melbourne's Cut Copy will be appreciative.

auth_sentence.content: For example, how to copy movies from DVDs.
auth_sentence.res_content: For example, how to copy movies from DVDs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For example, how to copy movies from DVDs.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps it will become the mark of an author to reckon with that he or she is still published in hard copy.
What I mean by that is the current perspective of the digital textbook is it's an exact copy of the print book.

Excuses can get very elaborate: "I know I'm look at another's exam, even though I'm supposed to keep my eyes on my own paper, but that's not cheating because I'm just checking my answers, not copying.

sentences.en: I sent the letter, but kept a copy for my files.
sentences.cn: 我寄了信, 但留了份影印本存档。

sentences.en: He asked me to make ten copies of the document.
sentences.cn: 他叫我把这份文件复印十份。

sentences.en: The difficulty is to get enough good copy to fill the magazine.
sentences.cn: 困难的是如何为该杂志组到足够多的好材料。
你一定要把它抄写清楚。

jushi.english: If you can't afford a new copy of the book, perhaps you can find a second hand copy.
jushi.chinese: 如果你买不起一本新的,你或许可以找到一本旧的。

jushi.english: The author favoured us with a copy of his latest book.
jushi.chinese: 作者答应送给我们一本他的近作。

jushi.english: I want a piece of copy paper.
